comments:
Abolished 1.4.1935 and divided between the parishes of Abenbury, 
    Wrexham Regis and Marchwiel.
Abolished 25.3.1885 and added to the parish ofAbenbury Fawr.

Abolished 1.4.1935 and divided between the parishes of Wrexham 
    Regis, Gresford, Bieston and Gwersyllt.
Abolished 1.4.1935 and added to the parish of Bieston.
Abolished 1.4.1935 and added to the parish of Bieston.
Abolished 1.4.1935 and added to the parish of Isycoed.
Abolished 1.4.1935 and added to the parish of Isycoed.
Abolished 1.4.1935 and added to the parish of Isycoed.

On 30.9.1897 the part in Flintshire  became 
    part of the parish of Overton, so that thereafter Erbistock was entirely in Denbigshire. 
    See also Table 2, notes (h) and (l).

Abolished 1.4.1935 and divided between the parishes of Abenbury 
    and Wrexham Regis.

Renamed 1.4.1974 to become the community of Erddig. See also Table 
    2, note (l).
Abolished 1.4.1935 and added to the parish of Erbistock.
Abolished 1.4.1935 and added to the parish of Bieston.
Abolished 1.4.1935 and added to the parish of Sesswick.
Abolished 1.4.1935 and added to the parish of Isycoed.
Abolished 1.4.1935 and added to the parish of Sesswick.

Abolished 1.4.1935 and divided between the parishes of Wrexham 
    Regis and Gwersyllt.
Abolished 1.4.1935 and added to the parish of Isycoed.

On 30.9.1896 the part in Flintshire was transferred to Cheshire, so that thereafter Threapwood was wholly in Cheshire. See 
    also Table 2, note (f).
Abolished 25.3.1885 and added to the parish of Wrexham Regis.
